game.name: Wizard Hand
game.shortDescription: Wizard Hand is a magical deckbuilder game where solitaire meets roguelike. You play solitaire by using your magical cards to uncover dazzling combos and accumulate magical points with the help of enchantments, crafting, and a collection of powerful artifacts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wizard Hand is a magical deckbuilder game where solitaire meets roguelike. You play solitaire by using your magical cards to uncover dazzling combos and accumulate magical points with the help of enchantments, crafting, and a collection of powerful artifacts.
